ch0097_40_mai/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]... You came to
see me?
ch0097_40_mai/0101_0701_02_10: I’m happy to see you... At least a little.
ch0097_40_mai/7101_0701_01_10:
I once heard a story from long ago, back when
Sinnoh was called Hisui.
ch0097_40_mai/7101_0701_02_10: It’s about a Shaymin who saved someone.
ch0097_40_mai/7101_0701_03_10:
That Shaymin must’ve been so happy for the
person’s gratitude...
ch0097_40_mai/7102_0701_01_10: This outfit flutters like a flower. It’s so cute...
ch0097_40_mai/7102_0701_02_10:
It also makes me a little happier every time
I wear it.
ch0097_40_mai/7103_0701_01_10:
Being around flowers makes me feel gentle
and kind...
ch0097_40_mai/7103_0701_02_10:
If you’re ever feeling anxious, try looking at
some flowers.
ch0097_40_mai/7103_0701_03_10: It might help you feel the same.
ch0097_40_mai/7104_0701_01_10:
Shaymin are Pokémon that express feelings
of gratitude.
ch0097_40_mai/7104_0701_02_10: I wish I could be like Shaymin...
ch0097_40_mai/7104_0701_03_10: Actually, I shouldn’t just wish... I should do it!
ch0097_40_mai/7105_0701_01_10:
Spending time with you warms my heart,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]...
ch0097_40_mai/7105_0701_02_10:
I wonder why. Maybe it’s because you’re such a
kind person...
ch0097_40_mai/1701_0702_01_10: It’s a small token of my gratitude...
ch0097_40_mai/2501_0701_01_10: Do you know about Gracidea flowers?
ch0097_40_mai/2501_0701_02_10:
They’re wonderful flowers that can be used to
convey gratitude...
ch0097_40_mai/2501_0701_03_10:
Other flowers have their own unique meanings...
Or so I’m told.
ch0097_40_mai/2501_0701_04_10:
I didn’t know much about all this before, but Erika
taught me a lot...
ch0097_40_mai/2501_0702_01_10:
If you have trouble expressing your feelings with
words, flowers can help.
ch0097_40_mai/2501_0702_03_10:
But if flowers don’t cut it, we’ll have to try our
best with words!
ch0097_40_mai/2511_0701_01_10: It can be hard to express your feelings...
ch0097_40_mai/2511_0702_01_10: You’re the reason I have a bit of fun every day.
ch0097_40_mai/2511_0702_02_10: We battle together, hang out together...
ch0097_40_mai/2511_0702_03_10: And I’ve even made some new friends.
ch0097_40_mai/3001_0701_01_10:
Food is the source of life. I hope I’m getting
enough nutrition...
ch0097_40_mai/3003_0701_01_10:
I found some flowers with a relaxing aroma...
Would you like to come and see them with me?
ch0097_40_mai/3005_0701_01_10:
It’s already so late... I feel a little forlorn, but I’ll
see you tomorrow.
